display.name: Broker URL
display.Description: Enter a broker URL in the form '<protocol>://<host>:<port>'

display.name: Username
display.Description: Enter a username if this connection requires one

display.name: Password
display.Description: Enter a password if this connection requires one

display.name: Encryption Mode
display.description: Choose the type of authentication to use

display.name: Cacert
display.description: Select the CA certificate file used to sign the broker's certificate

display.name: Client Cert
display.description: Select the client certificate file for connections requiring client auth

display.name: Client Key
display.description: Select the client key file used for connections requiring client auth
